src_original: yāvad vahantaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayād vayasanam āpāditam* /  tato maitrakanyakaḥ phalakam āsādya sthalam anuprāptaḥ /
tgt_original: 海有神魚，其名摩竭，觸敗其船，眾皆喪身，彌蘭騎板，僅而獲免。

src_original: tataḥ sthale cañcūryamāṇo nadūrān nagaraṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāmnā dṛṣṭavān* /
tgt_original: 風漂附岸，地名鼻摩，登岸周旋庶自蘇息，覩一小徑尋之而進。 遙見銀城，樹木茂盛，間有浴池，周旋四表，甘水遶之。

src_original: sa tad upajagāma /  yāvat tataś catasro 'psaraso nirgatāḥ,  abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ /  tāḥ kathayanti:
tgt_original: 有四美人，容齊天女，奉迎之曰：

src_original: idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
tgt_original: 今斯銀城，其中眾寶，黃金白銀，水精琉璃，珊瑚虎珀，車𤦲為殿，妾等四女給仁使役，晚息夙興，惟命所之，願無他遊。

src_original: āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti /  sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*,  yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
tgt_original: 』彌蘭入城昇七寶殿，懽娛從欲，願無不有，處中千餘年。 彌蘭惟曰：

src_original: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati sadāmattaṃ nāma nagaram* /  sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ /  yāvat tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /  tāḥ kathayanti:
tgt_original: 「遙覩金城，有八玉女，迎辭如上，玉女華容，又踰四人。

src_original: ehi maitrakanyaka,  svāgataṃ te,  idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /  āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti /  sa tābhiḥ sahānekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*  yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
tgt_original: 城中寶殿，名曰屑末，明月真珠諸寶踰前，壽數千萬歲。

src_original: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati nandanaṃ nāma nagaram* /  sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ /  yāvat tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /  tāḥ kathayanti:  ehi maitrakanyaka,
tgt_original: 「又覩水精城，有十六玉女出迎之矣，其辭如上，要將入城昇七寶殿。

src_original: svāgataṃ te,  idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /  āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti /  sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /  tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
tgt_original: 城殿眾寶，玉女光華踰前，居中歲數，又數千萬。

src_original: sa yato dakṣiṇāyāḥ paddhater nivāryate,  tataḥ suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhito gantum* /  yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati brahmottaraṃ nāma prāsādam* /  sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ /  yāvat tasmād api dvātriṃśad apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
tgt_original: 「意不厭足，又伺諸女臥出亡去，復覩琉璃寶城，光曜奕奕，有三十二女出迎跪拜，虔辭如上。

src_original: tac ca mṛgayūthaṃ lubdhakena vicārya rājñe niveditam* /  tato rājñā caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena nirgatya tan mṛgayūthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkaṭīkṛtam* /  tato yūthapater etad abhavat*:
tgt_original: 牧人以聞，王率士眾合圍逼之。 鹿王乃知，垂泣而曰：

src_original: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi,  adyaiva te sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyantīti /
tgt_original: 『爾等斯厄，厥尤由我也。 吾將沒命，濟爾群小。

src_original: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti /  sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* /
tgt_original: 『登吾踊出，爾等可全矣。 』群鹿如之，咸獲免矣。

src_original: sā ca nadī ahāryahāriṇī śīghrasrotāḥ,  te ca mṛgā durbalāḥ /  tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati:  āgacchantu bhavantaḥ,  etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata /
tgt_original: 身肉決裂，血若流泉，躃地纔息，其痛難言。 群鹿啼呼，徘徊不去。
